attributes.action: stop the use of closed source software in public schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Software such as Microsoft Office and windows are costly. These costs can be wiped out by switching to open source software. Most hardware in schools are not capable of running Windows XP, yet using alternatives would keep this older hardware still active. It would also free up money for schools allowing better resources for pupils. It would also allow pupils to experience new exciting things to do with computing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
